# Assignment


::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_8c39ee6f0f9a98638dbe6cc20ed52b2a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
#> ✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.4
#> ✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
#> ✔ ggplot2   3.4.4     ✔ tibble    3.2.1

#> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
#> ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_997a5718e50ce73c48a42097e852d702'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Create two unrelated variables
set.seed(789)
x <- rnorm(20)
y <- sin(x) + rnorm(20, sd = 0.2)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_8f6723e2a736958cf4fe39802e8ee774'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Create a dataframe
data <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a4a34180bfe4547fd932d3a0658bf3f6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Create a scatter plot with a smooth line
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "green") +
  labs(title = "Spurious Correlation",
       x = "Variable X",
       y = "Variable Y") +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::
